extendedInfo.description: IMPORTANT: Electronic Sourcebook subscription required.The CopWare Reference Collection is everything you need to become a better California peace officer. Containing both the California Peace Officers Legal Sourcebook and the California Codes, the CopWare Reference Collection gives you the critical information you need to excel at your job. The text in the Sourcebook is annotated with links to the Codes. Whenever you see a reference to a code in the Sourcebook, just tap to read it! This invaluable tool lets you quickly and thoroughly research for promotional exams or prepare cases for conviction. CopWare, Inc. is the sole authorized publisher of the electronic versions of the Sourcebook.

reviews.title: Great resource
reviews.comment: Our dept paid for it. Pretty good resource, but it needs better search. I would like be able to type pc 647(f) and it pops up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Small fixes would make it 5 star
reviews.comment: I love copware. Used it for years on a computer. It\'d be nice to type in the code or title and it comes up at the top of the list. I know its new and I\'m confident its only getting better
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Improve search
reviews.comment: Improved searching and ability to share data via email could both be huge improvements.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t get mobile version
reviews.comment: The search feature is almost worthless. You can\'t bookmark, can\'t highlight, and can\'t cut and paste. And it\'s expensive. I have a serious case of buyer\'s remorse.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too much $
reviews.comment: The billing issue really sucks. Being the ONLY company authorized by the State\'s AG office to put out a digital sourcebook, you\'d think they\'d make it affordable for the intended audience...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Overpriced
reviews.comment: They charge extra for mobile access yet you can access the regular database using your phones internet browser.  So they are basically charging you extra for a stream lined phone app that adds no additional functionality.  I think copware is doing its regular subscribers a disservice by double charging for the same info
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rip off
reviews.comment: You have to pay twice to get the same information. Crap!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Double Charge
reviews.comment: You have to pay for mobile access separate from your regular access even separate from online access.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ofc.
reviews.comment: Says i have id and password. But wont let me use the mobile version till i pay for the mobile version. Ok, where is the link to buy it? Gteat info Poor app in my humble opinion.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Confused
reviews.comment: Why is it free on line but not on your phone app???
reviews.author: A Google User
